SevenZip.Name: 7-Zip
SevenZip.Description: 7-Zip is a free and open-source file archiver, a utility used to place groups of files within compressed containers known as "archives". It is developed by Igor Pavlov and was first released in 1999. 7-Zip uses its own 7z archive format, but can read and write several other archive formats.
SevenZip.Uninstall: $IdentifyingNumber = Get-WmiObject Win32_Product -filter "Name LIKE '<Name>%'" | Select-Object -ExpandProperty IdentifyingNumber cmd /c "msiexec /x $IdentifyingNumber /qn"

AdobeAcrobatDCDutch.Name: Adobe Acrobat DC
AdobeAcrobatDCDutch.Description: Adobe Acrobat Reader DC-software is de gratis, vertrouwde wereldwijde standaard voor het bekijken, afdrukken, ondertekenen, delen en annoteren van PDF's. Het is de enige PDF-viewer die alle soorten PDF-inhoud kan openen en gebruiken, inclusief formulieren en multimedia.
AdobeAcrobatDCDutch.Install: Start-Process <Source> "-sfx_nu /sALL /msi EULA_ACCEPT=YES ENABLE_CHROMEEXT=0 DISABLE_BROWSER_INTEGRATION=1 ENABLE_OPTIMIZATION=YES ADD_THUMBNAILPREVIEW=0 DISABLEDESKTOPSHORTCUT=1 UPDATE_MODE=0 DISABLE_ARM_SERVICE_INSTALL=1" -Wait New-ItemProperty -LiteralPath "HKLM:\SOFTWARE\Policies\Adobe\Adobe Acrobat\DC\FeatureLockDown" -Name 'bUpdater' -Value 0 -PropertyType DWord -Force -ea SilentlyContinue
AdobeAcrobatDCDutch.Uninstall: $IdentifyingNumber = Get-WmiObject Win32_Product -filter "Name LIKE '<Name>%'" | Select-Object -ExpandProperty IdentifyingNumber cmd /c "msiexec /x $IdentifyingNumber /qn"

AdobeAcrobatDCEnglish.Name: Adobe Acrobat DC
AdobeAcrobatDCEnglish.Description: Adobe Acrobat Reader DC software is the free, trusted global standard for viewing, printing, signing, sharing, and annotating PDFs. It's the only PDF viewer that can open and interact with all types of PDF content including forms and multimedia.
AdobeAcrobatDCEnglish.Install: Start-Process <Source> "-sfx_nu /sALL /msi EULA_ACCEPT=YES ENABLE_CHROMEEXT=0 DISABLE_BROWSER_INTEGRATION=1 ENABLE_OPTIMIZATION=YES ADD_THUMBNAILPREVIEW=0 DISABLEDESKTOPSHORTCUT=1 UPDATE_MODE=0 DISABLE_ARM_SERVICE_INSTALL=1" -Wait New-ItemProperty -LiteralPath "HKLM:\SOFTWARE\Policies\Adobe\Adobe Acrobat\DC\FeatureLockDown" -Name 'bUpdater' -Value 0 -PropertyType DWord -Force -ea SilentlyContinue
AdobeAcrobatDCEnglish.Uninstall: $IdentifyingNumber = Get-WmiObject Win32_Product -filter "Name LIKE '<Name>%'" | Select-Object -ExpandProperty IdentifyingNumber cmd /c "msiexec /x $IdentifyingNumber /qn"

CitrixWorkspaceApp.Description: Citrix Workspace app for Windows is an easy-to-install app that provides access to your applications and desktops using Citrix Virtual Apps and Desktops and Citrix DaaS (formerly Citrix Virtual Apps and Desktops service) from a remote client device.

FileZilla.Description: FileZilla is a free software, cross-platform FTP application, consisting of FileZilla Client and FileZilla Server. Client binaries are available for Windows, Linux, and macOS, server binaries are available for Windows only.

FoxitReaderDutch.Name: Foxit PDF Reader
FoxitReaderDutch.Description: Foxit Reader is een meertalige freemium PDF-tool waarmee u PDF-bestanden kunt maken, bekijken, bewerken, digitaal ondertekenen en afdrukken.
FoxitReaderDutch.Install: msiexec /i <Source> "DESKTOP_SHORTCUT=\"0\" MAKEDEFAULT=\"0\" VIEWINBROWSER=\"0\" LAUNCHCHECKDEFAULT=\"0\" AUTO_UPDATE=\"0\" /passive /norestart /qn" Start-Sleep -s 90
FoxitReaderDutch.Uninstall: $IdentifyingNumber = Get-WmiObject Win32_Product -filter "Name LIKE '<Name>%'" | Select-Object -ExpandProperty IdentifyingNumber cmd /c "msiexec /x $IdentifyingNumber /qn"

FoxitReaderEnglish.Name: Foxit PDF Reader
FoxitReaderEnglish.Description: Foxit Reader is een meertalige freemium PDF-tool waarmee u PDF-bestanden kunt maken, bekijken, bewerken, digitaal ondertekenen en afdrukken.
FoxitReaderEnglish.Install: msiexec /i <Source> "DESKTOP_SHORTCUT=\"0\" MAKEDEFAULT=\"0\" VIEWINBROWSER=\"0\" LAUNCHCHECKDEFAULT=\"0\" AUTO_UPDATE=\"0\" /passive /norestart /qn" Start-Sleep -s 90
FoxitReaderEnglish.Uninstall: $IdentifyingNumber = Get-WmiObject Win32_Product -filter "Name LIKE '<Name>%'" | Select-Object -ExpandProperty IdentifyingNumber cmd /c "msiexec /x $IdentifyingNumber /qn"

Chrome.Name: Google Chrome
Chrome.Description: Google Chrome is a cross-platform web browser developed by Google. It was first released in 2008 for Microsoft Windows, and was later ported to Linux, macOS, iOS, and Android where it is the default browser built into the OS.
Chrome.Uninstall: $IdentifyingNumber = Get-WmiObject Win32_Product -filter "Name LIKE '<Name>%'" | Select-Object -ExpandProperty IdentifyingNumber cmd /c "msiexec /x $IdentifyingNumber /qn"

GreenShot.Name: GreenShot
GreenShot.Description: Greenshot is a free and open-source screenshot program for Microsoft Windows. It is developed by Thomas Braun, Jens Klingen and Robin Krom and is published under GNU General Public License, hosted by GitHub. Greenshot is also available for macOS, but as proprietary software through the App Store.

KeePass_Dutch.Name: KeePass
KeePass_Dutch.Description: KeePass is a free open source password manager, which helps you to manage your passwords in a secure way. You can store all your passwords in one database, which is locked with a master key. So you only have to remember one single master key to unlock the whole database.
KeePass_Dutch.Install: Enable-WindowsOptionalFeature -FeatureName "NetFx3" -Online -NoRestart msiexec /i <Source> ALLUSERS=1 /qn $appName = 'KeePass' $drive = 'C:\Temp' $LocalPath = $drive + '\' + $appName Remove-Item -Path $LocalPath -Recurse -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue New-Item -Path $drive -Name $appName -ItemType Directory -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue set-Location $LocalPath $SetupURL = 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/knowledgebaseit/Temp/main/KeePass_Dutch.zip' $setupzip = 'KeePass_Dutch.zip' $ProgressPreference = 'SilentlyContinue' Invoke-WebRequest -Uri $SetupURL -OutFile $setupzip Expand-Archive $LocalPath\KeePass_Dutch.zip -DestinationPath "$Localpath" -Force -Verbose Copy-Item 'C:\Temp\KeePass\Dutch.lngx' 'C:\Program Files (x86)\KeePass2x\Languages' -Recurse -Force Copy-Item 'C:\Temp\KeePass\KeePass.config.enforced.xml' 'C:\Program Files (x86)\KeePass2x' -Recurse -Force Remove-Item "C:\Users\Public\Desktop\KeePass.lnk" -Recurse
KeePass_Dutch.Uninstall: $IdentifyingNumber = Get-WmiObject Win32_Product -filter "Name LIKE '<Name>%'" | Select-Object -ExpandProperty IdentifyingNumber cmd /c "msiexec /x $IdentifyingNumber /qn" Remove-Item "C:\Program Files (x86)\KeePass2x" -Recurse

NotePadPlusPlus.Description: Notepad++ is a text and source code editor for use with Microsoft Windows. It supports tabbed editing, which allows working with multiple open files in a single window. The project's name comes from the C increment operator. Notepad++ is distributed as free software.

MicrosoftNETDesktop.Description: The .NET Desktop SDK, which includes Windows Forms (WinForms) and Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF)
MicrosoftNETDesktop.Uninstall: $IdentifyingNumber = Get-WmiObject Win32_Product -filter "Name LIKE '<Name>%'" | Select-Object -ExpandProperty IdentifyingNumber cmd /c "msiexec /x $IdentifyingNumber /qn"

MicrosoftEdge_Dutch.Name: Microsoft Edge
MicrosoftEdge_Dutch.Description: Microsoft Edge is the best browser for Windows. Sync your passwords, favorites, and settings across multiple devices and start using Microsoft Edge today.
MicrosoftEdge_Dutch.Install: Start-Process <Source> -ArgumentList "/S" New-Item -Path 'HKLM:\Software\Policies\Microsoft\Edge' -Force | Out-Null New-Item -Path 'HKLM:\Software\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SpellCheckLanguage' -Force | Out-Null New-ItemProperty -Path 'HKLM:\Software\Policies\Microsoft\Edge' -Name 'ApplicationLocaleValue ' -Value 'nl' -PropertyType String -Force | Out-Null New-ItemProperty -Path 'HKLM:\Software\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SpellCheckLanguage' -Name '1 ' -Value 'nl' -PropertyType String -Force | Out-Null
MicrosoftEdge_Dutch.Uninstall: $IdentifyingNumber = Get-WmiObject Win32_Product -filter "Name LIKE '<Name>%'" | Select-Object -ExpandProperty IdentifyingNumber cmd /c "msiexec /x $IdentifyingNumber /qn"

MicrosoftFSLogixApps.Name: Microsoft Edge
MicrosoftFSLogixApps.Description: Microsoft Edge is the best browser for Windows. Sync your passwords, favorites, and settings across multiple devices and start using Microsoft Edge today.
MicrosoftFSLogixApps.Install: Start-Process <Source> -ArgumentList "/S" New-Item -Path 'HKLM:\Software\Policies\Microsoft\Edge' -Force | Out-Null New-Item -Path 'HKLM:\Software\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SpellCheckLanguage' -Force | Out-Null New-ItemProperty -Path 'HKLM:\Software\Policies\Microsoft\Edge' -Name 'ApplicationLocaleValue ' -Value 'nl' -PropertyType String -Force | Out-Null New-ItemProperty -Path 'HKLM:\Software\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SpellCheckLanguage' -Name '1 ' -Value 'nl' -PropertyType String -Force | Out-Null
MicrosoftFSLogixApps.Uninstall: $IdentifyingNumber = Get-WmiObject Win32_Product -filter "Name LIKE '<Name>%'" | Select-Object -ExpandProperty IdentifyingNumber cmd /c "msiexec /x $IdentifyingNumber /qn"

ZoomWindows.Description: Zoom is a cloud-based video communications app that allows you to set up virtual video and audio conferencing, webinars, live chats, screen-sharing, and other collaborative capabilities.

WinSCP.Description: WinSCP is a free and open-source SFTP, FTP, WebDAV, Amazon S3 and SCP client for Microsoft Windows. Its main function is secure file transfer between a local and a remote computer. Beyond this, WinSCP offers basic file manager and file synchronization functionality.

TreeSizeFree.Description: TreeSize is a disk space analyzer written by JAM Software. TreeSize has native 32 and 64-bit support for all Windows versions and client/server versions currently supported by Microsoft.

MozillaFirefox.Description: Mozilla Firefox, or simply Firefox, is a free and open-source web browser developed by the Mozilla Foundation and its subsidiary, the Mozilla Corporation. Firefox uses the Gecko layout engine to render web pages, which implements current and anticipated web standards.

Gimp.Description: GIMP is a free and open-source raster graphics editor used for image manipulation and image editing, free-form drawing, transcoding between different image file formats, and more specialized tasks. GIMP is released under GPLv3+ license and is available for Linux, macOS, and Microsoft Windows.

MicrosoftWvdRemoteDesktop.Description: You can use the Remote Desktop client for Windows Desktop to access Windows apps and desktops remotely from a different Windows device.
